title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 214.5 - Civil enforcement officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 214.5 - Civil enforcement officers

State Regulations
(a) All enforcement officers shall keep
accurate and detailed records, properly indexed, of all functions performed by
them, pursuant to law, rule or order, in their capacity as law enforcement
officers. (b) In
addition to the enforcement officers enumerated in UJCA 110, the municipal
board may designate other persons to serve as enforcement officers in civil
matters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
214.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
